channel.title: Need 667 rsps help please
channel.description:
Hi i am new on this forum but i really need help
two days ago i started my own 667 runescape private server it's the extinction client i've made my own jar file and a webclient i don't want to put it on the internet for 'everyone' i just want to have fun with some friends so thats why i use hamachi so that they can connect
but if my friend clicks on the jar file i sent him the loader stays at 1% and the webclient does the same i portforwarded port 43594 and still it stays 1% on their computer (it's not even neccesary to portforward if you're using hamachi right?) i've put the hamachi ip in the loader.java and still it doenst work
i really don't know what i'm doing wrong so if there is anybody who can help me i will really appreciate it and if you want to play on the server your most welcome ;-)
thank you for reading i hope you can help.

item.title: Need 667 rsps help please
item.dc:creator: @brentje87 brentje87
item.description:

Hi i am new on this forum but i really need help

two days ago i started my own 667 runescape private server it’s the extinction client
i’ve made my own jar file and a webclient
i don’t want to put it on the internet for ‘everyone’ i just want to have fun with some friends so thats why i use hamachi so that they can connect
